main_vars <- cbind(

precrisis_end <- "2008-09-12"

crisis_start <- "2008-09-15"
crisis_end <- "2009-01-31"

precrisis <- xtable(summary(window(

  start = precrisis_start,

xtable(t(reported_precrisis), digits = 3)

crisis <- xtable(summary(window(
  main_vars, 
  start = crisis_start,
